text: Matheus Rezende Assis (born 17 March 1995) is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Goiás. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Goiás |2016 |rowspan="3"|Série B |1||1||0||0||0||0||colspan="2" |–||0||0||1||1 |- |2017 |1||1||2Appearances in the Campeonato Goiano||0||0||0||colspan="2" |–||0||0||3||1 |- |2018 |0||0||3||0||0||0||colspan="2" |–||0||0||3||0 |- |2019 |Série A |0||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2" |–||0||0||0||0 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !2!!2!!5!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!7!!2 |- |Boa Esporte (loan) |2019 |Série C |0||0||2Appearances in the Campeonato Mineiro||0||0||0||colspan="2" |–||0||0||2||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !2!!2!!7!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!9!!2 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== *Goiás Profile Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Goiás Esporte Clube players Category:Boa Esporte Clube players
